Package com.example.RestaurantsAPI

Class ReadJsonFile

java.lang.Object
com.example.RestaurantsAPI.ReadJsonFile
public class ReadJsonFile
extends java.lang.Object
This class is created for Reading JSON from file and to perform operations on data from a JSON file.

    • isNearLocation

      public boolean isNearLocation​(org.json.JSONObject eatery) throws org.json.JSONException
      This function tells is resteurant from JSONOBJECT is closer than 1.5 km from us
      Parameters:
      eatery - Restaurant JSON Object
      Returns:
      True if restaurant is closer than 1.5 km
      Throws:
      org.json.JSONException

    • distance

      public double distance​(double lat1, double lat2, double lon1, double lon2, double el1, double el2)
      Calculate distance between two points in latitude and longitude taking into account height difference. If you are not interested in height difference pass 0.0. Uses Haversine method as its base. lat1, lon1 Start point lat2, lon2 End point el1 Start altitude in meters el2 End altitude in meters I returned result without square root to increase the accuracy of calculations
      Parameters:
      lat1 - Start latitude
      lat2 - End latitude
      lon1 - Start longitude
      lon2 - End longitude
      el1 - Start altitude
      el2 - End altitude
      Returns:
      I returned result without square root to increase the accuracy of calculations (meters)

    • findAllNear

      public java.util.List<Restaurant> findAllNear() throws org.json.JSONException
      This function find all Restaurants that are closer than 1.5 km from your place
      Returns:
      List of all restaurants that are closer than 1.5 km
      Throws:
      org.json.JSONException

      public java.util.List<Restaurant> findPopularRestaurants​(java.util.List<Restaurant> nearRestaurants) throws org.json.JSONException
